name: cloudnews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Flash news skill that uses public rss feeds from:

AWS announcements
AWS Official Blog
AWS Machine Learning Blog
AWS Developer Blog
AWS Lambda Updates
AWS IoT Blog
AWS Security blog

You can ask "Alexa: my latest news" to listen titles and first words from the latest posts in those feeds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
